jobDescription: We are looking for a Senior Full Stack Engineer to join our team at Meta. The ideal candidate will have 7+ years of experience building scalable web applications. Requirements: Strong experience with React, Node.js, and TypeScript. Experience with distributed systems and microservices architecture. Knowledge of AWS or similar cloud platforms. Experience with GraphQL and REST APIs. Strong understanding of database design (PostgreSQL, MongoDB). Experience with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices. Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to mentor junior developers. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
